rajaye idam balahathkarayen athkaragena sitina pudgalayinta erehiwa nithi magin katayuthu kara ema idam nawatha rajayata athpath kara ganime wadapiliwelak idam ha idam sanwardhana amathyanshaya kriyathmaka karayi.mundalama, kalpitiya, wanathawilluwa ha puththalama yana pradeshiya lekam kottasawala kalayak thisse rajaye idam balahathkarayen allaganime jawaramak pilibandawa amathyanshayata thorathuru labimen pasuwa owunta erehiwa nithi magin kriya kirimata amathyanshaya thiranaya kara thibe.

aarambhaka deshanaya kala pujya bengamuwe dhammadinna himayo maha rawana raju apata wadagath wanuye warthamanaye lankawa sambandhayen lokaye pawathina jathyanthara hangima saha kriyakarakam parada nangi sitimata ada apa darana uthsaha ha samana uthsahayak eda rawana rajathumatada ganimata siduwima thula apata maha rawana shakthiya, balaya labima nisa bawa pawasa sitiyaha.
